game.name: Snapshots
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A short game about organizing messy spaces. Place every object back where it belongs, discovering and deciphering secrets hidden amongst the clutter.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short game about organizing messy spaces. Place every object back where it belongs, discovering and deciphering secrets hidden amongst the clutter.
